text: Adam Kompała (born 16 August 1973 in Ruda Śląska) is a former Polish footballer who played as a midfielder. ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Górnik Zabrze players Category:Ruch Radzionków players Category:Szczakowianka Jaworzno players Category:Podbeskidzie Bielsko- Biała players Category:Jagiellonia Białystok players Category:Piast Gliwice players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Sportspeople from Ruda Śląska
title: Adam Kompała
